title: Mirror’s Edge: Catalyst – v1.0.3.47248 + 2 DLC
body:

Genres/Tags: Arcade, Platform adventure, Open world, First-person, 3D
Companies: DICE / EA
Languages: RUS/ENG/MULTI9
Original Size: 23.2 GB

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on Mirrors.Edge.Catalyst-CPY ISO release: cpy-mec.iso (24,923,693,056 bytes)
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 23.2 to 16.7 GB)
  • Installation takes: ~40 minutes on 4-cores CPU + SSD; ~1 hour on 4-cores CPU + HDD; ~1 hour 30 minutes on 2-cores CPU + HDD
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: 24 GB (~31 GB during installation)
  • Use “Language Selector.exe” in game root to change the game language

Game Description

Mirror’s Edge Catalyst is a first-person action-adventure game in which the player takes control of Faith Connors as she progresses through a futuristic city named Glass. Similar to the original Mirror’s Edge, players traverse the city using aspects of urban exploration and parkour movements to complete missions and evade or fight enemies.
